    • Constructor Detail

      • InteliCwDB

        public InteliCwDB(java.lang.String filename)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Load a database from the file.
        Parameters:
        filename - Filepath of database source. All entries have to be saved line by line like in this example:
        Word 1
        Definition 1
        Word 2
        Definition 2
        etc.
        File have to be coded in UTF-8.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
